page.title: 05PEOPLE
page.content: During the research for this block several local people were interviewed. The overwhelming impression one is left with is of a caring and friendly group of people. One man worked in the past at the now disused rubbish tip above Lower Knapp Farm (154956). He had seen many changes in the Roncombe valley. He had worked on the many of the farms in the valley and explained how in 1939 17 men were employed in the Roncombe. He obviously has a great respect for the area and spoke with some sadness about how much of the beauty of the Roncombe had been lost during his lifetime.
